index_hero_title: IVS JSC: Realizing the Vision of Global Education
index_hero_subtitle: IVS – Strategic Thinking, Practical Action, Global Values. Explore a comprehensive ecosystem of solutions in education, technology, and consulting.
index_pillars_subtitle: We create value through four main pillars, closely integrated to deliver breakthrough and sustainable solutions.
index_pillar_education_desc: Providing multi-level partnership programs, skills training, and foreign languages according to international standards.
index_pillar_tech_desc: Developing EdTech solutions and professional website designs under the IVS Celestech brand.
index_pillar_consulting_desc: Offering comprehensive support in legal matters, business establishment, and educational development strategy.
index_pillar_global_desc: Building bridges for studying abroad, cultural exchange, and supplying a global education workforce.
index_core_services_subtitle: From foundational education to technology solutions and strategic consulting, IVS provides a comprehensive service ecosystem.
index_service_edupartnership_desc: Collaborating to implement advanced educational programs from Kindergarten to High School, integrating STEAM and future skills.
index_service_tech_desc: Providing professional website design services and developing breakthrough EdTech solutions under the IVS Celestech brand.
index_service_legalbiz_desc: Consulting on center/business establishment; supporting legal procedures, Work Permits, and civil matters.
index_ecosystem_subtitle: Where knowledge, tools, and entertainment converge. Access our exclusive repository of resources, applications, and educational games.
index_ecosystem_gallery_desc: Access a repository of documents, curricula, and in-depth articles on education and technology.
index_ecosystem_apps_desc: Tools to support teachers and students, from classroom management to connecting career opportunities.
index_ecosystem_games_desc: Learn while playing, play while learning with our collection of interactive and creative educational games.
index_testimonial_subtitle: The trust of our partners and the satisfaction of our clients are the measure of our success and the motivation for our continuous improvement.
index_testimonial_1: The EdTech solutions and partnership programs from IVS have truly transformed how we operate and teach. Their professionalism and strategic vision are incredible.
index_testimonial_1_title: Principal, Anh Duong International School System
index_testimonial_2: IVS JSC is not just a service provider; they are a true strategic partner. Their legal and operational consulting support has helped us grow sustainably.
index_news_subtitle: Stay updated with the latest activities, projects, and outstanding achievements from the IVS JSC ecosystem.
index_cta_subtitle: Whether you are a student, teacher, a partner, or an investor, IVS always has suitable opportunities and solutions for you. Let's connect to build the future together.
about_meta_description: Learn about IVS JSC - Integrate Vision Synergy Trading Service Joint Stock Company, its mission, vision, core values, leadership team and main activities.
og_description_about_full: Discover the philosophy, values, people and development orientation of IVS JSC - A pioneer organization in education, EdTech and international cooperation.
about_page_subtitle: INTEGRATE VISION SYNERGY TRADING SERVICE JOINT STOCK COMPANY
ivs_meaning_intro_subtitle: IVS JSC – Integrate Vision Synergy – is more than just a name; it embodies the integration of cutting-edge educational solutions, a forward-thinking strategic vision, and the synergy to build lasting value.
ivsmeaning_cta_en_title: Partner with IVS to Shape the Future!
ivsmeaning_cta_en_subtitle: IVS JSC is constantly seeking partners, investors, and passionate individuals who share our vision to elevate Vietnamese education to international standards. Be a part of the change!
contact_meta_description: Connect with IVS JSC for in-depth consultation on education, technology, and business solutions. We are always ready to listen.
contact_meta_keywords: IVS JSC, contact, address, hotline, email, consultation, contact form
contact_og_title: Contact IVS JSC - Connect to Grow Together
contact_og_description: Send your inquiries, questions, or cooperation proposals to IVS JSC via contact form, phone, email, or visit our office.
contact_hero_subtitle: IVS is always ready to listen, advise, and accompany you on your development path.
contact_info_desc: Please contact us through the channels below. The IVS team will respond as soon as possible.
contact_address_value: 1104, Group 6, Dat Moi Hamlet, Long Phuoc, Long Thanh, Dong Nai.
contact_form_message_placeholder: I would like to learn more about...
